pr_title: Gitlab: add information for TLS disabled mode

timeline.message:
Add information for TLS disabled mode

The Docker daemon supports connection over TLS and it’s done by default for Docker 19.03.1 or higher.
We need to instruct docker to not start over TLS with DOCKER_TLS_CERTDIR variable

timeline.bodyText: Why not DOCKER_TLS_CERTDIR: "/certs" as specified in the docs?
timeline.author: kiview
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -13,6 +13,8 @@ services:
 variables:
   # Instruct Testcontainers to use the daemon of DinD.
   DOCKER_HOST: "tcp://docker:2375"
+  # Instruct Docker not to start over TLS.
+  DOCKER_TLS_CERTDIR: ""

replies.bodyText:
Original doc uses DOCKER_HOST: "tcp://docker:2375" which indicates TLS disabled mode.
I kept this sample related to TLS disabled mode.
See this docs section: https://docs.gitlab.com/ee/ci/docker/using_docker_build.html#tls-disabled where DOCKER_HOST and DOCKER_TLS_CERTDIR is the same as I introduce in my PR here
replies.author: pmihalcin
